Mod.name: Mole's Souls
Mod.description:
This mod contains a new mechanic for Noita about gathering souls from enemies to use for your own endeavours and spells. To obtain souls you need to kill enemies with a reaping spell, and you will obtain one of the [b]12[/b] soul types. These can be used on your spells each granting different effects when used on spells like Soul Blast.
special thank Gustavo, Horscht (for settings code), Copi (thing), Calamari
